title: This has always bugged me about Mundo
body:
Sadism is when someone enjoys inflicting pain.
Masochism is when someone enjoys receiving pain.

So on Mundo, why does Masochism make him better at killing things, while sadism increases the numbers of hits he can take? Shouldn't those names be flipped?

replies.body: Big words hurt Mundo's head.  Mundo harms who he pleases.
Reminds me of Klungo.
+1 for Banjo Kazooie reference!
YESSSSSS!!! those games were a major part of my childhood.  N64 in general.

I will never question the names of these two abilities again. 

Or how throwing a clever somehow causes him pain.

Actually, the name of his passive should really be the name of his ultimate. That being Adrenaline Rush.

His ult is literally a burst of speed and stamina.

His passive should be Machoism, his E should be Sadism, and his ult should be Adrenaline Rush.

MUNDO NOT GOOD WITH WORDS

I'm pretty sure I saw a red post once that said that his E was supposed to be Sadism and his R was supposed to be Masochism but they were put into the game with the names switched by accident and just never changed.

> [{quoted}](name=Slamurai Jack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z9XXnd28,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-24T09:15:16.245+0000)
>
> I'm pretty sure I saw a red post once that said that his E was supposed to be Sadism and his R was supposed to be Masochism but they were put into the game with the names switched by accident and just never changed.

It isn't easy to just change them then? How difficult it is?

This late in the game, it would be counterproductive to change them now. For clarity I guess but it could possibly be really confusing for experienced Mundo players.

Such as, "Oh you're new to Mundo? Make sure you spam Masochism"
"But I don't get it till level 6"
"$@#!"

Do people ever call an ability by its name instead of by the key they are bound to?

I think that player would simply say "Make sure you spam your E".
you CAN hypothetically swap ur keys to make ur q key autocast ur e spell
Of course, but I think I've never met anyone who has changed abilities' bindings (outside of binding some abilities to their cool gaming-mouse extra keys).

I play with unlocked camera, moving it with the arrow keys. My Q is bound to a button on the side of my mouse, my W is Numpad 0, my E is Numpad 1, and my R is Numpad 2. Heal on Delete, Flash on End.

Couldn't stand the original bindings. (Never used them, actually, because when I first started playing I clicked on my abilities, so I could move the camera at the same time. Couldn't stop using the arrow keys, so I couldn't use QWER).
Remember "Spray and pray"? or "Expunge"? :P
http://memecrunch.com/meme/192B5/pepperidge-farm-remembers/image.png
+1 for family guy reference! Anyone who disagrees gets the cat launcher! https://media.giphy.com/media/Dvle3DdIB46XK/giphy.gif

It's the same way with {{champion:50}} 
They've never bothered to change the name of his root from Nevermove after it was spelled that way as a joke in testing.
That was intentional though.
I think that was intentional, or at least it's intentional now

http://i.imgur.com/plocQm7.jpg

edit: For some reason it's cutting the sides. Just click the image.

He cuts himself, thus elating himself to the point where can deal more damage.
Or damaging himself causes adrenaline-esque response and increases his physical strength.
Idk man Mundo is an interesting man
It does cost health to use.

Haha

BDSM Mundo Approved
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/DrMundo_5.jpg
The mere possibility of getting that skin in a mystery gift is half the reason I took the time to contact Riot support and have {{champion:36}} removed from my account.
That was a wise decision. I got Executioner Mundo and Elderwood Bard as my mystery skins.
My brother has never referred to that skin as anything other than "Gimp Mundo"
Mundo isms where he pleases.

The one thing that bothers me about Mundo:

Mr. Mundoverse doesn't throw dumbells. He throws his standard hatchet. Plz Rito. 

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/DrMundo_2.jpg

That and the fact Corporate Mundo's Burning Agony fails to replace the fire with office supplies. Seeing the flames on Corporate Mundo irks me.
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/DrMundo_3.jpg
It should at least be pink slips or something.
Mundo only pawn in game of life.
{{champion:36}} *slurping noises*

Masochism costs health, makes him happy. Fights better.

Sadism heals him a lot as he charges into teamfights and pulls and Olaf diving the carry.

Eh, for Sadism, couldn't you make the argument that by activating it he is inflicting pain as his enemies struggle to kill him?  And for Masochism, just go with he cut himself and got pumped so he now does more damage until the roid damage nerves stop sending pain signals.
mundo can be whatever he wants

Because he needs a gameplay and visual rework on the level of what Sion got. He's just an extremely old champion who's supposed to be some genius scientist serial killer, but thematically he's just too goofy to be taken seriously and gameplay wise he comes off as an idiot who waddles around and spams a single button while being impossible to kill.
tru
See, he cuts himself to gain a boost of damage because it hurts so good and he gets super excited when some one else gets hurt, so he gains super speed so he can cause them pain too.

His Sadism keeps him around to inflict more pain.
His Masochism hits harder the less health he has.
Mundo is a hipster.

Mundo probably not care about the difference. He just enjoy pain!

On a serious not, yeah you are right. Maybe someone on the creative team will take notice. Mundo as a whole is a definite sadomasochist (yes that is a word, probably misspelled too), so maybe someone just mixed up the terms and they forgot to change it back. Things happen sometimes.
Mundo suffers from both of these I believe. He enjoys hurting other (including himself) for science and enjoys feeling it.

The way I think of it is that you use Masochism on Masochists and you Sadism on Sadists. Basically use the move on whether the opponent is an S or M. Still doesn't make much sense now that I think about it.
If mundo is a masochist and loose a little bit of health... soraka might be the problem and is the leader of this organisation.
Designers knew about it and intentionally switched the ability names.
Contemplating whether to leave the upvotes at 69...
